member.summary: List all supported multiple-system operators

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.LimitRate
member.summary: Maximum download rate in bytes per second (e.g. 50K or 4.2M)

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.Retries
member.summary: Number of retries (default is 10), or "infinite".

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.FragmentRetries
member.summary: Number of retries for a fragment (default is 10), or "infinite" (DASH, hlsnative and ISM)

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.SkipUnavailableFragments
member.summary: Skip unavailable fragments (DASH, hlsnative and ISM)

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.AbortOnUnavailableFragment
member.summary: Abort downloading when some fragment is not available

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.KeepFragments
member.summary: Keep downloaded fragments on disk after downloading is finished; fragments are erased by default

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.BufferSize
member.summary: Size of download buffer (e.g. 1024 or 16K) (default is 1024)

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.NoResizeBuffer
member.summary: Do not automatically adjust the buffer size. By default, the buffer size is automatically resized from an initial value of SIZE.

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.HttpChunkSize
member.summary: Size of a chunk for chunk-based HTTP downloading (e.g. 10485760 or 10M) (default is disabled). May be useful for bypassing bandwidth throttling imposed by a webserver (experimental)

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.PlaylistReverse
member.summary: Download playlist videos in reverse order

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.PlaylistRandom
member.summary: Download playlist videos in random order

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.XattrSetFilesize
member.summary: Set file xattribute ytdl.filesize with expected file size

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.HlsPreferNative
member.summary: Use the native HLS downloader instead of ffmpeg

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.HlsPreferFfmpeg
member.summary: Use ffmpeg instead of the native HLS downloader

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.HlsUseMpegts
member.summary: Use the mpegts container for HLS videos, allowing to play the video while downloading (some players may not be able to play it)

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.ExternalDownloader
member.summary: Use the specified external downloader. Currently supports aria2c,avconv,axel,c url,ffmpeg,httpie,wget

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.ExternalDownloaderArgs
member.summary: Give these arguments to the external downloader

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.BatchFile
member.summary: File containing URLs to download ('-' for stdin), one URL per line. Lines starting with '#', ';' or ']' are considered as comments and ignored.

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.Id
member.summary: Use only video ID in file name

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.Output
member.summary: Output filename template, see the "OUTPUT TEMPLATE" for all the info

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.OutputNaPlaceholder
member.summary: ER Placeholder value for unavailable meta fields in output filename template (default is "NA")

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.AutonumberStart
member.summary: Specify the start value for %(autonumber)s (default is 1)

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.RestrictFilenames
member.summary: Restrict filenames to only ASCII characters, and avoid "&" and spaces in filenames

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.NoOverwrites
member.summary: Do not overwrite files

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.Continue
member.summary: Force resume of partially downloaded files. By default, youtube-dl will resume downloads if possible.

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.NoContinue
member.summary: Do not resume partially downloaded files (restart from beginning)

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.NoPart
member.summary: Do not use .part files - write directly into output file

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.NoMtime
member.summary: Do not use the Last-modified header to set the file modification time

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.WriteDescription
member.summary: Write video description to a .description file

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.WriteInfoJson
member.summary: Write video metadata to a .info.json file

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.WriteAnnotations
member.summary: Write video annotations to a .annotations.xml file

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.LoadInfoJson
member.summary: JSON file containing the video information (created with the "--write- info-json" option)

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.Cookies
member.summary: File to read cookies from and dump cookie jar in

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.CacheDir
member.summary: Location in the filesystem where youtube-dl can store some downloaded information permanently. By default $XDG_CACHE_HOME/youtube-dl or ~/.cache /youtube-dl . At the moment, only YouTube player files (for videos with obfuscated signatures) are cached, but that may change.

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.NoCacheDir
member.summary: Disable filesystem caching

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.RemoveCacheDir
member.summary: Delete all filesystem cache files

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.Help
member.summary: Print this help text and exit

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.Version
member.summary: Print program version and exit

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.Update
member.summary: Update this program to latest version. Make sure that you have sufficient permissions (run with sudo if needed)

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.IgnoreErrors
member.summary: Continue on download errors, for example to skip unavailable videos in a playlist

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.AbortOnError
member.summary: Abort downloading of further videos (in the playlist or the command line) if an error occurs

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.DumpUserAgent
member.summary: Display the current browser identification

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.ListExtractors
member.summary: List all supported extractors

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.ExtractorDescriptions
member.summary: Output descriptions of all supported extractors

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.ForceGenericExtractor
member.summary: Force extraction to use the generic extractor

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.DefaultSearch
member.summary: Use this prefix for unqualified URLs. For example "gvsearch2:" downloads two videos from google videos for youtube- dl "large apple". Use the value "auto" to let youtube-dl guess ("auto_warning" to emit a warning when guessing). "error" just throws an error. The default value "fixup_error" repairs broken URLs, but emits an error if this is not possible instead of searching.

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.IgnoreConfig
member.summary: Do not read configuration files. When given in the global configuration file /etc/youtube-dl.conf: Do not read the user configuration in ~/.config /youtube-dl/config (%APPDATA%/youtube- dl/config.txt on Windows)

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.ConfigLocation
P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.FlatPlaylist
member.summary: Do not extract the videos of a playlist, only list them.

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.MarkWatched
member.summary: Mark videos watched (YouTube only)

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.NoMarkWatched
member.summary: Do not mark videos watched (YouTube only)

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.NoColor
member.summary: Do not emit color codes in output

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.GeoVerificationProxy
member.summary: Use this proxy to verify the IP address for some geo-restricted sites. The default proxy specified by --proxy (or none, if the option is not present) is used for the actual downloading.

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.GeoBypass
member.summary: Bypass geographic restriction via faking X-Forwarded-For HTTP header

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.NoGeoBypass
member.summary: Do not bypass geographic restriction via faking X-Forwarded-For HTTP header

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.GeoBypassCountry
member.summary: Force bypass geographic restriction with explicitly provided two-letter ISO 3166-2 country code

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.GeoBypassIpBlock
member.summary: Force bypass geographic restriction with explicitly provided IP block in CIDR notation

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.Proxy
member.summary: Use the specified HTTP/HTTPS/SOCKS proxy. To enable SOCKS proxy, specify a proper scheme. For example socks5://127.0.0.1:1080/. Pass in an empty string (--proxy "") for direct connection

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.SocketTimeout
member.summary: Time to wait before giving up, in seconds

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.SourceAddress
member.summary: Client-side IP address to bind to

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.ForceIPv4
member.summary: Make all connections via IPv4

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.ForceIPv6
member.summary: Make all connections via IPv6

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.ExtractAudio
member.summary: Convert video files to audio-only files (requires ffmpeg/avconv and ffprobe/avprobe)

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.AudioFormat
member.summary: Specify audio format: "best", "aac", "flac", "mp3", "m4a", "opus", "vorbis", or "wav"; "best" by default; No effect without -x

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.AudioQuality
member.summary: Specify ffmpeg/avconv audio quality, insert a value between 0 (better) and 9 (worse) for VBR or a specific bitrate like 128K (default 5)

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.RecodeVideo
member.summary: Encode the video to another format if necessary (currently supported: mp4|flv|ogg|webm|mkv|avi)

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.PostprocessorArgs
member.summary: Give these arguments to the postprocessor

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.KeepVideo
member.summary: Keep the video file on disk after the post-processing; the video is erased by default

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.NoPostOverwrites
P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.EmbedSubs
member.summary: Embed subtitles in the video (only for mp4, webm and mkv videos)

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.EmbedThumbnail
member.summary: Embed thumbnail in the audio as cover art

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.AddMetadata
member.summary: Write metadata to the video file

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.MetadataFromTitle
member.summary: Parse additional metadata like song title / artist from the video title. The format syntax is the same as --output. Regular expression with named capture groups may also be used. The parsed parameters replace existing values. Example: --metadata-from-title "%(artist)s - %(title)s" matches a title like "Coldplay - Paradise". Example (regex): --metadata-from-title "(?P<artist>.+?) - (?P<title>.+)"

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.Xattrs
member.summary: Write metadata to the video file's xattrs (using dublin core and xdg standards)

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.Fixup
member.summary: Automatically correct known faults of the file. One of never (do nothing), warn (only emit a warning), detect_or_warn (the default; fix file if we can, warn otherwise)

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.PreferAvconv
member.summary: Prefer avconv over ffmpeg for running the postprocessors

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.PreferFfmpeg
member.summary: Prefer ffmpeg over avconv for running the postprocessors (default)

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.FfmpegLocation
P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.Exec
member.summary: Execute a command on the file after downloading and post-processing, similar to find's -exec syntax. Example: --exec 'adb push {} /sdcard/Music/ && rm {}'

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.ConvertSubs
member.summary: Convert the subtitles to other format (currently supported: srt|ass|vtt|lrc)

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.WriteSub
member.summary: Write subtitle file

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.WriteAutoSub
member.summary: Write automatically generated subtitle file (YouTube only)

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.AllSubs
member.summary: Download all the available subtitles of the video

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.ListSubs
member.summary: List all available subtitles for the video

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.SubFormat
member.summary: Subtitle format, accepts formats preference, for example: "srt" or "ass/srt/best"

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.SubLang
member.summary: Languages of the subtitles to download (optional) separated by commas, use --list-subs for available language tags

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.WriteThumbnail
member.summary: Write thumbnail image to disk

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.WriteAllThumbnails
member.summary: Write all thumbnail image formats to disk

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.ListThumbnails
member.summary: Simulate and list all available thumbnail formats

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.Quiet
member.summary: Activate quiet mode

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.NoWarnings
member.summary: Ignore warnings

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.Simulate
member.summary: Do not download the video and do not write anything to disk

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.SkipDownload
member.summary: Do not download the video

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.GetUrl
member.summary: Simulate, quiet but print URL

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.GetTitle
member.summary: Simulate, quiet but print title

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.GetId
member.summary: Simulate, quiet but print id

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.GetThumbnail
member.summary: Simulate, quiet but print thumbnail URL

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.GetDescription
member.summary: Simulate, quiet but print video description

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.GetDuration
member.summary: Simulate, quiet but print video length

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.GetFilename
member.summary: Simulate, quiet but print output filename

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.GetFormat
member.summary: Simulate, quiet but print output format

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.DumpJson
member.summary: Simulate, quiet but print JSON information. See the "OUTPUT TEMPLATE" for a description of available keys.

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.DumpSingleJson
member.summary: Simulate, quiet but print JSON information for each command-line argument. If the URL refers to a playlist, dump the whole playlist information in a single line.

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.PrintJson
member.summary: Be quiet and print the video information as JSON (video is still being downloaded).

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.Newline
member.summary: Output progress bar as new lines

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.NoProgress
member.summary: Do not print progress bar

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.ConsoleTitle
member.summary: Display progress in console titlebar

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.Verbose
member.summary: Print various debugging information

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.DumpPages
member.summary: Print downloaded pages encoded using base64 to debug problems (very verbose)

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.WritePages
member.summary: Write downloaded intermediary pages to files in the current directory to debug problems

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.PrintTraffic
member.summary: Display sent and read HTTP traffic

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.CallHome
member.summary: Contact the youtube-dl server for debugging

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.NoCallHome
member.summary: Do NOT contact the youtube-dl server for debugging

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.Format
member.summary: Video format code, see the "FORMAT SELECTION" for all the info

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.AllFormats
member.summary: Download all available video formats

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.PreferFreeFormats
member.summary: Prefer free video formats unless a specific one is requested

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.ListFormats
member.summary: List all available formats of requested videos

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.YoutubeSkipDashManifest
member.summary: Do not download the DASH manifests and related data on YouTube videos

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.MergeOutputFormat
member.summary: If a merge is required (e.g. bestvideo+bestaudio), output to given container format. One of mkv, mp4, ogg, webm, flv. Ignored if no merge is required

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.PlaylistStart
member.summary: Playlist video to start at (default is 1)

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.PlaylistEnd
member.summary: Playlist video to end at (default is last)

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.PlaylistItems
member.summary: Playlist video items to download. Specify indices of the videos in the playlist separated by commas like: "--playlist-items 1,2,5,8" if you want to download videos indexed 1, 2, 5, 8 in the playlist. You can specify range: "--playlist-items 1-3,7,10-13", it will download the videos at index 1, 2, 3, 7, 10, 11, 12 and 13.

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.MatchTitle
member.summary: Download only matching titles (regex or caseless sub-string)

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.RejectTitle
member.summary: Skip download for matching titles (regex or caseless sub-string)

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.MaxDownloads
member.summary: Abort after downloading NUMBER files

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.MinFilesize
member.summary: Do not download any videos smaller than SIZE (e.g. 50k or 44.6m)

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.MaxFilesize
member.summary: Do not download any videos larger than SIZE (e.g. 50k or 44.6m)

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.Date
member.summary: Download only videos uploaded in this date

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.DateBefore
member.summary: Download only videos uploaded on or before this date (i.e. inclusive)

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.DateAfter
member.summary: Download only videos uploaded on or after this date (i.e. inclusive)

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.MinViews
member.summary: Do not download any videos with less than COUNT views

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.MaxViews
member.summary: Do not download any videos with more than COUNT views

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.MatchFilter
member.summary: Generic video filter. Specify any key (see the "OUTPUT TEMPLATE" for a list of available keys) to match if the key is present, !key to check if the key is not present, key > NUMBER (like "comment_count > 12", also works with >=, <, <=, !=, =) to compare against a number, key = 'LITERAL' (like "uploader = 'Mike Smith'", also works with !=) to match against a string literal and & to require multiple matches. Values which are not known are excluded unless you put a question mark (?) after the operator. For example, to only match videos that have been liked more than 100 times and disliked less than 50 times (or the dislike functionality is not available at the given service), but who also have a description, use --match-filter "like_count > 100 & dislike_count <? 50 & description" .

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.NoPlaylist
member.summary: Download only the video, if the URL refers to a video and a playlist.

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.YesPlaylist
member.summary: Download the playlist, if the URL refers to a video and a playlist.

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.AgeLimit
member.summary: Download only videos suitable for the given age

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.DownloadArchive
member.summary: Download only videos not listed in the archive file. Record the IDs of all downloaded videos in it.

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.IncludeAds
member.summary: Download advertisements as well (experimental)

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.Encoding
member.summary: Force the specified encoding (experimental)

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.NoCheckCertificate
member.summary: Suppress HTTPS certificate validation

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.PreferInsecure
member.summary: Use an unencrypted connection to retrieve information about the video. (Currently supported only for YouTube)

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.UserAgent
member.summary: Specify a custom user agent

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.Referer
member.summary: Specify a custom referer, use if the video access is restricted to one domain

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.AddHeader
member.summary: Specify a custom HTTP header and its value, separated by a colon ':'. You can use this option multiple times

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.BidiWorkaround
member.summary: Work around terminals that lack bidirectional text support. Requires bidiv or fribidi executable in PATH

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.SleepInterval
member.summary: Number of seconds to sleep before each download when used alone or a lower bound of a range for randomized sleep before each download (minimum possible number of seconds to sleep) when used along with --max-sleep-interval.

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet.MaxSleepInterval
member.summary: Upper bound of a range for randomized sleep before each download (maximum possible number of seconds to sleep). Must only be used along with --min- sleep-interval.

member.name: T:YoutubeDLSharp.RunResult`1
member.summary: Encapsulates the output of a youtube-dl download operation.

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.RunResult`1.Success
member.summary: Indicates whether the operation was successful.

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.RunResult`1.ErrorOutput
member.summary: The accumulated error output.

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.RunResult`1.Data
member.summary: The output data.

member.name: M:YoutubeDLSharp.RunResult`1.#ctor(System.Boolean,System.String[],`0)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of class RunResult.

member.name: T:YoutubeDLSharp.Utils
member.summary: Utility methods.

member.name: M:YoutubeDLSharp.Utils.Sanitize(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sanitize a string to be a valid file name. Ported from: https://github.com/ytdl-org/youtube-dl/blob/33c1c7d80fd99024879a5f087b55b24374385e43/youtube_dl/utils.py#L2067

member.name: M:YoutubeDLSharp.Utils.GetFullPath(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the absolute path for the specified path string. Also searches the environment's PATH variable.
member.param: The relative path string.
member.returns: The absolute path or null if the file was not found.

member.name: T:YoutubeDLSharp.YoutubeDL
member.summary: A class providing methods for downloading videos using youtube-dl.

member.summary: Path to the youtube-dl executable.

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.YoutubeDL.FFmpegPath
member.summary: Path to the FFmpeg executable.

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.YoutubeDL.OutputFolder
member.summary: Path of the folder where items will be downloaded to.

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.YoutubeDL.OutputFileTemplate
member.summary: Template of the name of the downloaded file on youtube-dl style. See https://github.com/ytdl-org/youtube-dl#output-template.

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.YoutubeDL.RestrictFilenames
member.summary: If set to true, file names a re restricted to ASCII characters.

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.YoutubeDL.IgnoreDownloadErrors
member.summary: If set to true, download errors are ignored and downloading is continued.

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.YoutubeDL.Version
member.summary: Gets the product version of the youtube-dl executable file.

member.summary: Creates a new instance of the YoutubeDL class.
member.param: The maximum number of concurrent youtube-dl processes.

member.name: M:YoutubeDLSharp.YoutubeDL.SetMaxNumberOfProcesses(System.Byte)
member.summary: Sets the maximal number of parallel download processes.

member.name: M:YoutubeDLSharp.YoutubeDL.RunWithOptions(System.String[],YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Runs youtube-dl with the given option set.
member.param: The video URLs passed to youtube-dl.
The OptionSet of youtube-dl options.
A CancellationToken used to cancel the process.
member.returns: A RunResult object containing the output of youtube-dl as an array of string.

member.name: M:YoutubeDLSharp.YoutubeDL.RunUpdate
member.summary: Runs an update of youtube-dl.
member.returns: The output of youtube-dl as string.

member.name: M:YoutubeDLSharp.YoutubeDL.RunVideoDataFetch(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken,System.Boolean,YoutubeDLSharp.Options.OptionSet)
member.summary: Runs a fetch of information for the given video without downloading the video.
member.param: The URL of the video to fetch information for.
A CancellationToken used to cancel the process.
If set to true, does not extract information for each video in a playlist.
Override options of the default option set for this run.
member.returns: A RunResult object containing a VideoData object with the requested video information.

member.summary: Runs a download of the specified video with an optional conversion afterwards.
member.param: The URL of the video to be downloaded.
A format selection string in youtube-dl style.
If a merge is required, the container format of the merged downloads.
The video format the output will be recoded to after download.
A CancellationToken used to cancel the download.
A progress provider used to get download progress information.
A progress provider used to capture the standard output.
Override options of the default option set for this run.
member.returns: A RunResult object containing the path to the downloaded and converted video.

member.summary: Runs a download of the specified video playlist with an optional conversion afterwards.
member.param: The URL of the playlist to be downloaded.
The index of the first playlist video to download (starting at 1).
The index of the last playlist video to dowload (if null, download to end).
An array of indices of playlist video to download.
A format selection string in youtube-dl style.
The video format the output will be recoded to after download.
A CancellationToken used to cancel the download.
A progress provider used to get download progress information.
A progress provider used to capture the standard output.
Override options of the default option set for this run.
member.returns: A RunResult object containing the paths to the downloaded and converted videos.

The audio format the video will be converted to after downloaded.
A CancellationToken used to cancel the download.
A progress provider used to get download progress information.
A progress provider used to capture the standard output.
Override options of the default option set for this run.
member.returns: A RunResult object containing the path to the downloaded and converted video.

member.summary: Runs a download of the specified video playlist and converts all videos to an audio format afterwards.
member.param: The URL of the playlist to be downloaded.
The index of the first playlist video to download (starting at 1).
The index of the last playlist video to dowload (if null, download to end).
An array of indices of playlist video to download.
The audio format the videos will be converted to after downloaded.
A CancellationToken used to cancel the download.
A progress provider used to get download progress information.
A progress provider used to capture the standard output.
Override options of the default option set for this run.

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.YoutubeDLProcess.PythonPath
member.summary: The path to the Python interpreter. If this property is non-empty, youtube-dl will be run using the Python interpreter. In this case, ExecutablePath should point to a non-binary, Python version of youtube-dl.

member.summary: The path to the youtube-dl executable.

member.name: P:YoutubeDLSharp.YoutubeDLProcess.UseWindowsEncodingWorkaround
member.summary: Windows only. If set to true, start process via cmd.exe to support Unicode chars.
